metadata.title: CVE-2022-27378 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue in the component Create_tmp_table::finalize of MariaDB Server v10.7 and below was discovered to allow attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via specially crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
